name: PFC-Island
description:
https://www.canva.com/design/DAFYqZxxeAc/85vQ5UnnkDLi-pGSIP7LBA/view?utm_content...

The player enbody a lost child named Gabriel on the islands of Idoria. Wrecked, he’s trying to go back home. To do that he’s gonna need to explore the islands and fight the incarnation of rock, paper, scissors with magic rock, paper, scissors cards, and find the boat to escape.
